title: How do I setup DSDS on pixel 4XL? Instructions are incorrect.
content:
I am attempting to setup Dual Sim Dual Standby (DSDS).

The guide here: https://support.google.com/pixelphone/answer/9449293 is not helpful. It contains incorrect information for my build number.

Details:
Phone Model: Pixel 4 XL
Android Version: 10
Kernel Version: 4.14.111-gaee1b336488dd-ab5882136
Build Number: QD1A.190821.014

I was able to get an esim on the phone, and I have a physical sim. I rebooted 10-15 times and tried different activation orders.  I was never able to find or be prompted to activate DSDS.

Please assist,

Thank you in advance, 

Dewayne
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
